column3: Why do you change various width and height?\n

As far as I can workout, without those height/width changes the fee dialog box is no longer minimised when opening the Send tab, which would be altering the current behaviour. @jonasschnelli Can you take a look?\n
Height and width values should have no impact at all on being minimized (or hidden in Qt language). If they do, I'm afraid something is buggy.\n
@fanquake i will have a look at this as soon as im back from vacation (around 5th of march).\n

I disagree with adding more text to the button "Minimize"->"Minimize fee dialog". 
- At best, the user would think `What is the fee dialog?`
- Do we want to use the word 'dialog' in user facing messages at all? This is a UI design term not in general use.

This would be the rare case where a simple 'x' icon would be more descriptive than any amount of text.
I don't mind either way, if an X would be better lets use that. It just needs to be changed from what it is currently. \n
I'm fine with just moving the button, just not adding more text to it. The context should be enough to tell _what_ it minimizes.\n
